title: Color Pack not working
body:
Hello!

I bought  color pack for Fizz and have not been able to use it, I was able to use it just once. I was wondering if this was a known issue still?

Thank You!

Bruuuuh

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! Is this something you're experiencing every game, or just here and there? Which queue would you happen to be using?
Its every game with Fizz, I haven't been able to use the color pack, since URF mode.  I don't know if am doing something wrong.

You should be able to get into a queue, select the skin that has a chroma pack, and then click the color square of the chroma you'd like to use. Would you mind getting me a screenshot of what you're seeing in champion select?

Well, I dont know what happened but I just played fizz on the new feature game mode and it let me select the color pack. I think its good now. Thank You!

Sorry if I gave you more work then you already have!

/Bruuuh

Well, I guess the issue cameback when the feature game mode left. Here is a screenshot :(  

http://postimg.org/image/p3r8f93v5/

[](http://postimg.org/image/p3r8f93v5/)

Gah. This is interesting. Lemme take a look today and see if I can figure out what's going on. I'm currently not able to repro this. I know we're aware of an issue where these occasionally don't show, but if you're seeing this consistently, this may not be related. :c

Speaking about Chroma packs, what's up with those?
Are you guys planning to continue making those?
*Crosses fingers for a default Renekton Chroma pack*

We haven't announced anything around them, but we have been having discussions around them. You may have received a survey about potential options, or you may have seen screenshots of them on Reddit. ^-^

I haven't gotten any surveys, unfortunatly, and I don't really pay attention to reddit.
Anyhow 't should be fun seeing what you guys come up with c:
